review: I use my Chromecast regularly and it streams great.  I had some issues when it first come out, but those issues have been fixed.  I purchased a Fire Stick recently and find that I like it better since it comes with a remote and does not need a separate device to stream with.  Having HBO Go was the main PRO for Chromecast, but now that Fire Stick is getting it soon I would have to recommend the Fire Stick.  But if you are in the market for a Chromecast it does work great.
